detectors.description: MetalootProject._getRandomNumber(uint256) (MetalootProject.sol#325-339) uses a weak PRNG: random % _upper (MetalootProject.sol#338)
MetalootProject.getMetalootToBeClaimed() (MetalootProject.sol#312-320) uses a weak PRNG: tokenId (MetalootProject.sol#319)

MetalootProject._getRandomNumber(uint256) (MetalootProject.sol#325-339) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: random = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(availableMetaloots.length,blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.coinbase,block.difficulty,msg.sender))) (MetalootProject.sol#326-336)
